objects.text: Pink Drop Wreath Design | Perfect Gift for Her | 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
The banner showcases a luxurious and elegant design promoting premium jewelry. The background features a soft pink radial gradient with subtle decorative shapes and circular accents, giving a delicate and feminine vibe. At the top center, the heading (`heading`) is bold and eye-catching, followed by a subheading (`subheading`) that provides product details in a smaller serif font. Centrally placed is a high-quality image (`product_image`) of rose gold stud earrings, drawing immediate attention. Beneath it, a compact tagline (`tagline`) emphasizes key product highlights. Below that, the price (`price`) stands prominent in bold typography, alongside a stylish button (`cta_button`) with “SHOP NOW” (`cta`) in white text. The layout balances product imagery and information with elegant spacing.

**Color Palette:**
- Rose Pink: `#FEE1E8`
- Blush Pink: `#FFD6D6`
- Soft Coral: `#F5A5A5`
- Deep Rose (Text/CTA): `#8E3240`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases elegant floral earrings with a refined color palette that blends soft pinks with sparkling whites and silvers. The primary tones include a delicate rose gold (#F7B2B7) used for the earring's metal framework, adding warmth and femininity. The marquise and round-cut faux diamonds feature bright white (#FFFFFF) and subtle silver-gray reflections (#D6D6D6), creating a shimmering contrast against the pink. The blending is seamless, with the crystal embellishments catching light to highlight the pink petals. These color choices suggest sophistication and grace. Ideal banner colors: soft pink (#F7B2B7), white (#FFFFFF), silver-gray (#D6D6D6), blush rose (#FCD4D4).
